mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GALLERY.KYUNGMAE (K_NO, I_NO, I_NAME, I_IMG, K_FIRST_PRICE, K_FIRST_NO, K_FIRST_NAME, K_SECOND_PRICE, K_SECOND_NO, K_SECOND_NAME, K_REGDATE, K_STATE) VALUES(KYUNGMAE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{i_no}, #{i_name}, #{i_img}, #{k_first_price}, #{k_first_no}, #{k_first_name}, #{k_second_price},#{k_second_no}, #{k_second_name}, #{k_regdate}, #{k_state})
mapper.select: SELECT K_NO, I_NO, I_NAME, I_IMG, K_FIRST_PRICE, K_FIRST_NO, K_FIRST_NAME, K_SECOND_PRICE, K_SECOND_NO, K_SECOND_NAME, K_REGDATE, K_STATE FROM GALLERY.KYUNGMAE WHERE K_NO=#{k_no}
SELECT K_NO, I_NO, I_NAME, I_IMG, K_FIRST_PRICE, K_FIRST_NO, K_FIRST_NAME, K_SECOND_PRICE, K_SECOND_NO, K_SECOND_NAME, K_REGDATE, K_STATE FROM GALLERY.KYUNGMAE WHERE I_NO=#{i_no}
SELECT K_NO, I_NO, I_NAME, I_IMG, K_FIRST_PRICE, K_FIRST_NO, K_FIRST_NAME, K_SECOND_PRICE, K_SECOND_NO, K_SECOND_NAME, K_REGDATE, K_STATE FROM GALLERY.KYUNGMAE

SELECT K_NO, I_NO, I_NAME, I_IMG, K_FIRST_PRICE, K_FIRST_NO, K_FIRST_NAME, K_SECOND_PRICE, K_SECOND_NO, K_SECOND_NAME, K_REGDATE, K_STATE FROM GALLERY.KYUNGMAE WHERE K_STATE = #{k_state} ORDER BY K_NO DESC
